title: The two-year epidemiological investigation of the COVID-19 pandemic in the nomadic population of Fars province, Southern Iran: An ecological study (February 20, 2020, to February 19, 2022)
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Alireza Mirahmadizadeh, Ahad Amiri Gharghani, Alireza Heiran, Nadia Rahimpour
